description:
Ensure your lunch or ice cream remain chilled, all the way to your destination. The P9 trunk bag's main compartment is insulated, keeping the contents warm or cool as you desire. There's enough room for half a bag of groceries or a full lunch, and the waterproof fabric is dependable when the rain starts falling.Oceanweave® fabric is made with reclaimed fishnets.Water-resistant stiching and a polyurethane coating keep contents dry.Thermal-lined main compartment.Universal Velcro® mounting system attaches to top of rack.Zippered rear pocket provides quick access to essentials.

        Sustainability














                      Recycled content
name: Axiom Seymour Oceanweave P9 Trunk Bag
